channel.title: brand protection on Ongoing Marketing
channel.description: Recent content in brand protection on Ongoing Marketing

item.title: Competitive Marketing in digital marketing era
item.description: Typical case for competitive marketing When you are about to buy a mobile phone, which brand jumps out first in your mind? Apple iPhone is undoutedly the one leading the option list in the market. But what are the alternatives ? If you don’t have enough budget or you need an Android for a particular purpose, which brand are you thinking of right away when you are composing the list ?
